# MyLife - React Native Expo Project Setup

## Project Overview
A habit tracking app with gamification features including pixel avatar, water tracker, sleep tracker, focus timer, habit management, and character customization.

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Scaffold React Native Expo JavaScript project

- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Compile and verify project
- [x] Create README documentation
